citeinfo.origin: National Park Service (NPS) Geologic Resource Evaluation (GRE) program
citeinfo.title: Digital Coal Outcrops of Cumberland Gap National Historical Park and Vicinity, Kentucky, Tennessee and Virginia (NPS, GRD, GRE, CUGA, CUGA digital map)

citeinfo.origin: National Park Service (NPS) Geologic Resource Evaluation (GRE) program
citeinfo.title: The Digital Geologic Map of Cumberland Gap National Historical Park and Vicinity, Kentucky, Tennessee and Virginia

descript.abstract: The Digital Coal Outcrops of Cumberland Gap National Historical Park and Vicinity, Kentucky, Tennessee and Virginia consists of GIS data. Please see the GRE digital map metadata record (cuga_metadata.txt) for additional information. The data were completed as a component of the Geologic Resource Evaluation (GRE) program, a National Park Service (NPS) Inventory and Monitoring (I&M) funded program that is administered by the NPS Geologic Resources Division (GRD). The data were captured, grouped and attributed as per the NPS GRE Geology-GIS Geodatabase Data Model v. 2.0. (available at: http://science.nature.nps.gov/im/inventory/geology/GeologyGISDataModel.cfm). The data is within the area of interest of Cumberland Gap National Historical Park.
descript.purpose: The data are intended to assist NPS personnel in the protection and management of Cumberland Gap National Historical Park.
descript.supplinf: This dataset is just one component of the CUGA digital map. Please see the GRE digital map metadata record (cuga_metadata.txt) for additional information.
